review: I had consulted the doctor for my diabetes regular check-up. ********* *** **** ** ******. I can surely recommend doctor to others. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. There was no waiting time in the hospital, consultation happened on time.

I had visited the hospital as I had diabetes issue. ****** *** **** ***** I am regularly visiting him for the last 6 years. I can surely recommend doctor to others. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. There was not much waiting time in the hospital. Monthly once I use to visit for a general checkup.

*** ** *** ********** ****** * **** **** ******* ** ** ***** very discouraging, upsetting after had the interaction with him. As a doctor if u think some problem is there with patient health there should be way of telling it in positive manner but he always talks negative and that creates more panic in patients. ******** ********** *** ** **** **** *** ***** Waiting time is horrible with him. I have waited more than an hour to just to show him the scan report.

My wife had been to hospital and consulted the doctor for a general check-up as she had thyroid problem. We are not happy with consultation. Doctor spoke very limited and was not showing any interest to listen to patient. Treatment wise too not happy. He also made sarcastic comments thrice and we are very much disappointed with it. He asked what's purpose of visit and we told him we came for routine check-up and he was like you are coming after 3 years. He told to continue same medicines. Multivitamin tablets were prescribed but he didn't suggest or write when to use and how many to be taken. We purchased and later we checked with nurse about tablets. There was some waiting time in the hospital, it was for 30 minutes.

Consulted the doctor at global hospital Perumbakkam. His team doctors had changed my previously high dose tablet saying my blood sugar was too low and prescribed a low dose for couple of weeks. Now that my blood sugar has shot up due to this new medication he's prescribing insulin. Also he was very inconsiderate and discouraging. I am now a bit apprehensive after consulting him.
